metadata.Title: CVE-2017-0532 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An information disclosure vulnerability in the MediaTek video codec drivercould enable a local malicious application to access data outside of itspermission levels. This issue is rated as Moderate because it firstrequires compromising a privileged process. Product: Android. Versions:N/A. Android ID: A-32370398. References: M-ALPS03069985.
